Key.Original: Please select a flag via the mousewheel menu. This must be done during the ceasefire!
Key.English: Please select a flag via the mousewheel menu. This must be done during the ceasefire!
Key.German: Bitte eine Flagge über das Mausradmenü wählen. Dies muss während der Waffenruhe geschehen!

Key.Original: <t size='2.0' color='#D7DF01'>Choice of the attack flag</t>
Key.English: <t size='2.0' color='#D7DF01'>Choice of the attack flag</t>

Key.Original: All possible attack flags are marked with a black circle. The selected flag is highlighted in blue, green or red, depending on the side. It can be selected as often as you like.
Key.English: All possible attack flags are marked with a black circle. The selected flag is highlighted in blue, green or red, depending on the side. It can be selected as often as you like.
Key.German: Alle möglichen Angriffsflaggen sind mit einem schwarzen Kreis markiert. Die gewählte Flagge wird je nach Seite blau,grün oder rot hervorgehoben. Es kann beliebig oft neu gewählt werden.

Key.Original: Mine laid in the mine-restricted area! Mine was deleted.
Key.English: Mine laid in the mine-restricted area! Mine was deleted.
Key.German: Mine in der Minensperrzone gelegt! Mine wurde gelöscht.
